name: Zepp
overview: Move the Zeppelin safely through the treacherous maze, avoid the traps and tricks. Avoid the walls and keep your fuel levels up. Published in Magic Disk 64 1992/01. You have been given the task of searching for the wreckage of previous expeditions in a sunken city and the surrounding areas. Seven zeppelins have already crashed there. You are not supposed to investigate the city, just find and rescue the seven zeppelins. Three precision instruments give you valuable information about your Zeppelin: a thermometer, an air pressure gauge and a fuel gauge. Always keep an eye on these ads to avoid accidents.
